release.action: Improved data staging management in core engine.
Fix problem with data staging in WMS plug-in.
Added support for dCache implementation in SRM plug-in.
Added a per method/protocol configurable timeout.

release.description: Interface stabilized: SAGA Java Binding v1.0
release.action: Integrated version 1.0 of the reference Java Binding.
Added initial adaptor for NAREGI Super Scheduler.
Renamed configuration files (jsaga-engine.properties -> jsaga-config.properties, jsaga-config.xml -> jsaga-universe.xml)
Add support for GSI to iRoDS and SRB plug-ins.
Fixed dependencies management in GUI installer.

release.description: Initial implementation of job collection management

release.action: Added adaptors for SSH and fork.
Engine made compliant to 'snapshot-1' of SAGA Java Binding. Management of Job Collections is still under development...
Added adaptors for gLite WMS, Globus WS-GRAM and Unicore 6.
